file_content.text: We'll never forget what you've done for House Panteer.
Area's secure, everyone. Looks like the hard part's been taken care of.
That's him, isn't it? Bouris Ulgo has finally been defeated. The usurper's reign has finally ended.
Lord Aurren--the mission was a success. Bouris Ulgo is dead.
Dead... hmph. It's no more than the traitor deserved, I suppose. Lord Viktus--our house owes you and House Thul a great debt.
You are very gracious, your lordship. We were only too happy to grind this treacherous scum under heel on behalf of the people of Alderaan. Isn't that right?
It is always an honor to serve, my lord.
As you say.
We are honored by your assistance.
A bit of violence always cheers me up.
It was a pleasure.
Ah... yes, well, good.
I always get my target. That's all there is to it.
It's what I do.
You make it sound simple, but what you've accomplished is remarkable.
A simple, high-profile assassination. No trouble at all.
Yes, my lord.
The quality of your training is certainly without question.
It was hardly the easiest thing I've ever done, but I managed.
It could've been worse.
I'd say you've done far more than just manage.
I only care about my reward.
Yes, yes of course. Great deeds merit great rewards.
You have removed Bouris Ulgo from the throne, and proved House Thul's commitment to the future of Alderaan. So you will have my support.
Bouris Ulgo, in the flesh. I wasn't sure if I'd ever have the pleasure.
Save your mockery, Panteer. If your house were stronger, we wouldn't be here now.
Prisoners do not speak.
Quiet! [Hit Bouris Ulgo.]
Let's get this traitor out of here.
Not very diplomatic, for a king.
Charming, isn't he?
He'll have plenty of time to remember his manners in our holding cells.
Get this scum out of my sight.
The fool is all yours.
It will be my pleasure.
Lord Aurren--the operation was a success. Bouris Ulgo is in our custody.
It's finally over. The usurper will finally face justice. You were right, Lord Viktus--our house owes you and House Thul a great debt.
Yes--I must admit, even I am surprised that it was possible to capture the usurper alive. I... hadn't expected that particular windfall.
This will ensure justice for the people of Alderaan.
It's for the best.
Exactly. And there's nothing the people of Alderaan deserve more now than seeing justice done.
I couldn't care less about your expectations.
It wasn't all that hard.
Perhaps you should.
If Alderaan wants Bouris Ulgo dead, let Alderaan kill him.
I'm no executioner.
That's right. The usurper's fate should be decided and carried out for all to see.
House Thul and the Empire will always honor their bargains.
I did as our ally requested.
You've certainly proven yourselves today.
Happy to oblige.
Let's discuss my reward.
Of course. No reward is great enough for what you've achieved today, but you deserve everything we can give.
You have delivered Bouris Ulgo, as promised. You have proved House Thul's commitment to the good of Alderaan. So you will have my support.
Will your influence be enough to persuade those... misled brothers and cousins of yours who have sided with House Organa?
I'll do my best. But the Organas may not take well to losing--I fear this conflict could be far from over.
If you ever need my help again, you only need to ask.
You can always count on me.
I will certainly be keeping you in mind.
After all that I've done, House Thul's position still isn't secure?
You must be kidding.
It is only a matter of time. You should be satisfied that you had the opportunity to play such a large role.
From now on, leave me out.
It would be a shame if you refused any further opportunities to serve. You should keep that in mind.
Your work is done for the time being. You can go on about your own business.
House Panteer will never forget what you've done for us. Thank you.
